room_title: Escape room "French Quarter House of Curiosities" by Clue Carré in New Orleans
review: This was an hour of interesting fun! It's great to try new things. We played with four and that seemed right for the "Curiosities" room. The staff was friendly. Check it out. Good brain stretch.

room_title: Escape room "French Quarter House of Curiosities" by Clue Carré in New Orleans
review: Great for either first timers or enthusiasts. Love the House of Curiosities in particular! Ask for Rhys or Sham - they are the best!

room_title: Escape room "French Quarter House of Curiosities" by Clue Carré in New Orleans
review: Had a great time escaping the Fresh Quarter House of Curiosities! Definitely recommend it to everyone, minus small children. Matt got us started and was awesome!

room_title: Escape room "French Quarter House of Curiosities" by Clue Carré in New Orleans
review: We did the Curiosity Shop room with Jasmin as our Game Master. She was extremely helpful with clues when we needed them and very enthusiastic. You have to be very attentive to succeed. It was so much fun!

room_title: Escape room "French Quarter House of Curiosities" by Clue Carré in New Orleans
review: This was my first experience trying an escape room and it was a blast! We beat the French Quarter House of Curiosities with 4 seconds to spare! 2 hours later and I still can't stop smiling! Now I want to try all the rooms!
